briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Alogliptin and Metformin Fixed-Dose Combination in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Determine the Efficacy and Safety of Alogliptin and Metformin Fixed Dose Combination, Alogliptin Alone, or Metformin Alone in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

arms.label: Alogliptin 12.5 mg + Metformin HCl 500 mg FDC

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of alogliptin and metformin fixed-dose combination (FDC) as compared with alogliptin alone or metformin alone on Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (T2DM).

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Glycosylated Hemoglobin (HbA1c) at Week 26 (or Early Termination)

effectByArm.arm: Alogliptin 12.5 mg + Metformin HCl 500 mg FDC
